member.name: T:CohortSystem.My._Dialogs
member.summary: Contains wrappers for common dialog operations where the intent is to keep method based and easy to maintain.
member.remarks: I did one Dialog using CreateLineBreaks to show that you can be a tad lazy in how to create multiple lines of text in a dialog. All the others could easy include this too.
